DOC.brief_summary: A medical device study assess clinical accuracy equivalence reference device SVSS satisfy requirement recognise applicable international standard . The SVSS design measure display 5 vital sign : pulse rate , blood oxygen saturation ( Sp02 ) , blood pressure , body temperature respiration rate . These result compare accuracy result obtain use standard vital sign measurement equipment subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Demonstrate Clinical Accuracy Smartphone Vital Signs System ( SVSS )
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer , male female , 18 yr old , willing able participate sign inform consent form .
